title: Reading Order for Rhys Bowen Updated 2017: Read Molly Murphy in Order, Read Her Royal Spyness Mysteries in Order, Read Constable Evans Series in Order
description: Read Rhys Bowen in Order!  When you read the works of any author, it is always a better experience if you read the books in the right order. If you don't, you spoil the story, or won't be able to see how the author has progressed in her writing.  With this reading order list for Rhys Bowen, you will be able to read her three series; The Constable Evan Series, The Molly Murphy Series, The Royal Spyness Series as well as her stand-alone books and short stories in the right order.  Make sure you have read her previous books before picking up a new one with this reading order book for Rhys Bowen!  If you want to keep track of what you have or haven't, simply use your Kindle's built-in highlight feature and highlight the books you have already read.  Get Reading Order for Rhys Bowen right now and start enjoying some of the best mystery novels available on Kindle today!
